abstract: Is a mega-media deal — a merger of Comcast and NBC Universal — imminent? The nation’s biggest cable company says no, denying a report saying the two were set to combine.
snippet: Is a mega-media deal — a merger of Comcast and NBC Universal — imminent? The nation’s biggest cable company says no, denying a report saying the two were set to combine.
lead_paragraph: Update | 10:03 p.m. Is a mega-media deal — a merger of Comcast and NBC Universal — imminent?

headline.main: Comcast Denies Report of a Deal for NBC Universal

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Andrew Ross Sorkin

abstract: A claim from a Web side prompted the cable provider to issue a statement about the television and film business owned by G.E.
snippet: A claim from a Web side prompted the cable provider to issue a statement about the television and film business owned by G.E.
lead_paragraph: Comcast, the cable system operator, denied a report on Wednesday that it had reached an agreement to buy the television and film business NBC Universal from General Electric.

headline.main: Comcast Denies Report on a Deal to Buy NBC Universal
headline.print_headline: Comcast Denies Report on a Deal to Buy NBC Universal

abstract: Despite denials from Comcast, rumors that the company might ink a deal to buy a stake in NBC Universal continued unabated Wednesday.
snippet: Despite denials from Comcast, rumors that the company might ink a deal to buy a stake in NBC Universal continued unabated Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Despite denials from Comcast, rumors that the company might ink a deal to buy a stake in NBC Universal continued unabated Wednesday.

headline.main: Rumors of Comcast Talks for NBC Universal Continue

abstract: David Faber, a CNBC correspondent, emphasized that “the prospective deal is complex and is far from a certainty.”
snippet: David Faber, a CNBC correspondent, emphasized that “the prospective deal is complex and is far from a certainty.”
lead_paragraph: General Electric and its NBC Universal unit are in talks with Comcast to spin off a new company, which would consist of the creative assets of NBC Universal and Comast.

headline.main: GE and Comcast Exploring a Spinoff of NBC Universal
